name: HerokuBannedDeployer
description: With this you can deploy repos that are banned/blacklisted by heroku

OTHER_INSTALLS.description: If you need install packages for running your app(Python is pre-installed).[Space in between each package]

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @UseTGSBot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @UseTGSBot

CAPTION.description: If you want to add a caption to the forwarded file, enter it here

FILTER_TYPE.description: Type Of filters (document , audio , photo , video , animation)
